inn1.comm: right on the button! Tight line on off, Amla shuffles forward and across as he defends it solidly
good length and comes in with inward movement, Amla inches forward and blunts it
hurled in very full and outside off, Amla exploits the pace of the bowler, opens the face and runs it between gully and backward point. Neatly done
pitched up and keeps going away with the angle outside off. Amla chases it with a drive and is beaten
good length and angled away outside off, no shot offered
pitched up and just a shade outside off, stops a touch on Amla. He seeks to drive and spoons it wide of the covers
he serves up a warm-up ball down the leg side, Amla seeks to glance it away. Off the thigh pad and sneaks away fine on the leg side, past the diving keeper
floated up and holds its line in the channel. Amla does not bother with it
Mashrafe drags his length back on a fourth-stump line, Amla dabs it in front of point
on a goodish length and just a shade outside off, Amla pokes and bisects it between wide slip and keeper with an edge, sneaks away to the third-man boundary
full and outside off, brings Amla forward. Driven nice and straight to the covers
fractionally short and just a shade outside off, Amla hunts for a late-cut but does not connect properly. Chops it behind to the right of the keeper
inducker from Mustafizur, QdK does not move his feet much but foils the lbw appeal via an inner snick. Mustafizur nearly sneaked through the gate
overpitched and outside off, Qdk is forward as he drills a drive and finds the man at cover
too full and straight, QdK twirls his wrists and flicks it through midwicket
back of a length, top-of-off line, punchily defended to mid-off
full and on off, Amla pushes it to mid-off
slides away with the angle outside off on a fuller length, Amla is happy to watch it through to Mushfiq
floats another one down leg, Mashrafe hasn't got his lines right
back of a length and on middle, QdK tips forward and tucks it to short midwicket
slippery short ball at 126ks, QdK was perhaps early into a pull, wearing it on his thigh pad
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, QdK strides forward and blocks it to off
good length and on middle, tapped to mid-off
tapped to mid-off again, this time they hare across for a speedy single. Tamim collects the ball quickly at mid-off but fails to effect a direct hit at the non-strikers' end
fullish and outside off, Amla pats it defensively towards the covers

Prancing delivery. Mustafizur strikes and claps his hands in joy. This one explodes from a shortish length and outside off, leaving QdK squared up. Popped to backward point off the shoulder of the bat. Sabbir moves to his right and swallows it
short and skids onto Faf, who hangs back, pulls his bottom hand off the bat. Defends it onto the pitch off the splice
back of a length offcutter outside off, jags away. Faf shoulders arms to it
Mustafiz pulls pace off this outside off, dabbed to second slip with soft hands
back of a length and outside off, Faf keeps back and punches it to the covers and gets off the mark
pitched up and homing in on off, now Amla yanks his bottom hand off his bat as he diffuses it onto the pitch
back of a length and just a shade outside off with some extra bounce. Defended off the back foot
a touch overpitched and this is much sweeter from Faf. He shows off the full face of the bat, holds his pose and caresses through mid-on. Kids, that's how you play the on-drive
full and floated outside off, left alone
and againnn. Pushed full and outside off, no shot offered
this does not bounce at all. Might have been a slower one outside off, keeps low. Poked to the leg side off an inside edge
jumps down the track, manufactures a length ball and pushes it to mid-off
full and outside off, drags Amla forward into a drive. Mustafizur snares the outside edge but it does not carry to Nasir in the cordon
yorker, right in the blockhole at the base of off. Amla jams it down to backward point
full and stays a touch low outside off, Amla, having anticipated more bounce, bottom-edges it on the bounce to Mushfiq, behind the wicket
loose ball and dispatched. Serves up a full toss just outside off, punched past backward point
straying onto the hips, picked away through square leg
back of a length and nips in on middle, blocked to off
on a fullish length and just a shade outside off, back-and-across trigger as Amla pinches a quick single, dabbing the ball in front of square leg with ultra-soft hands
fractionally short and just a shade outside off, mis-hit forcing stroke to backward point
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Faf camps back and rides it to deep third man
on a length and on off, Amla allows the ball to come to him before dropping it behind point and trotting off to the other end
back of a length and outside off, punched by Faf. Nasir runs across to his right, agile one-handed save
fuller and outside off, Faf threads the gap between backward point and the covers with a good-looking drive
room on offer outside off, Amla slashes, does not carry to backward point
full and on off, punchily driven to mid-off after pressing forward
dug in short and wide outside off. The ball does not come onto Amla, who mistimes a cut and chops it to backward point
full and sliding away with the angle outside off, Amla covers his off stump and lets it pass
pitched up and outside off, driven behind point to deep third man
Faf clatters a pull and banishes it to the deep-midwicket boundary. Short without any bite, Faf pivots back and yells fire away
tossed up and outside off, pushed to the covers
flighted and on off, Amla makes a bit of room and attempts an inside-out loft-drive. Ends up chipping it in front of long-off
drags his length back, straight roller. Blocked from the crease
arm-ball, arrows in with the angle. Faf manages an inside edge onto the pad
slides on a back of a length, jabbed to the off side
Faf nips down the track, meets the pitch of this one and drives it smoothly to long-off
fuller and just a shade outside off, Faf lets it pass to Mushfiq
fullish and angled in on off, pushed to mid-on off the inside half of the bat
too straight in line, Faf clips it to deep midwicket
fractionally short and wide outside off, flashed to deep third man
shortish and outside off, punched to the off-side sweeper
Amla keeps back and guides this back-of-a-length ball outside off to deep third man
tossed up but drifting onto the pads, Amla flicks it neatly through midwicket but there is protection in the deep
flighted and drifts in on middle, blocked back to the bowler
stops on Faf outside off as he rocks back and pushes it tamely to point
Faf comes down the track and manufactures his own length as he drives a single down to long-on
Amla looks to drive this full ball and skews it to the leg side off an inside edge
Shakib gives this more air outside off, Amla succeeds in driving it down to long-off

Rubel razes the off stump. It goes for a toss. He is mobbed by his team-mates. The umpires check for a possible no-ball. Rubel is okay and Amla has to go. Back of a length, nips in a touch on off, hurries onto Amla. He does not connect with the across-the-line flick. Rubel nails the top of off
welcomes the new batsman with a bumper outside off, RR gets out of the way
follows it with an outswinging yorker, RR camps back and digs it out
back of a length and tucks up RR for room, jabbed towards the covers
back of a length and on middle, punchily defended down the ground
fractionally short and just a shade outside off, keeps back and punches it to the covers
pitched up on off, driven to the left of long-on after jumping down the track
hint of turn, defended off the back foot
floated on off, blocked to the off side
slides on with the arm outside off and kicks up from a length, plays for the turn and is beaten
tossed up, pushed back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it and deflects it to mid-on
flatter at 82ks, dabbed in front of the covers. Faf wants a quick single but Rissouw does not show any interest
back of a length and on off, RR stands tall as he punches it to the covers
fractionally short and on middle, he keeps back and blocks it back to the bowler
short and width on offer, leans back and cuts it to backward point
straight in line, straight-bat push to mid-off
very full and on off, squeezes out a drive and finds the covers
successive maidens for Rubel. Back of a length, punched to mid-off. RR now wants a single but is sent back by Faf
flat and outside off, pushed to the covers
Faf rocks back and strokes it to sweeper cover
pushed through quicker, punched down to long-on
lobbed up and drifts in. Shakib held this one back as Faf jumped out of his crease. Eventually he ends up defending it quietly
flighted on middle, blocked calmly
flatter and fired on off, Faf goes on the back foot and forces it to deep cover
banged in short but does not have much pace to pose a threat. Faf pivots on the back foot and pulls it through backward square leg
pitched up and on off, mis-hit drive to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, played to backward point
pitched up and on off, Faf rolls his wrists on it and tucks it round the corner
banged in short and stops on RR, who miscues a pull over midwicket
clean and effective. Faf gallops down the track, gets a length ball and hoists it over mid-off
RR goes back and mistimes a punchy strike to short midwicket
too full and straight, nudged to backward square leg
Shakib gives this more air and turn. RR shuffles outside the line of the leg stump, misses the drive and wears it on the pad
straight roller on middle, defended back
loopier and fuller on off, milked down to long-on

Nasir gets RR first ball. He has missed a straight ball. Hurries on with the arm on off, RR camps back in the crease and wants to slap it through the covers after stepping away a touch but does not connect. The off stump is rattled and the crowd roars with Nasir. 4 off 24 balls; end of a jittery little knock. It was going nowhere
looped up on middle, forward and smothered to the off side, adjacent to the pitch
drifts in on middle, inside-edged onto the pitch
very straight in line, nudged to leg for one
flighted and full on off, steps out but does not meet the pitch of the ball. Poked back to the bowler
on a length and on middle, turned to midwicket
flighted and on off, down the track and driven to long-on
tapped wide of the covers for a single
too full and straight, tucked through midwicket
picked away off the pads behind the square leg umpire
full ball on middle, which is knocked to midwicket
comes down the track, Shakib slides it down the leg side. Miller adjusts and helps it to long leg
pushed through on middle, defended back to the bowler
tossed up and spins on middle, blocked to leg
goes on with the arm on middle, defended to he leg side, adjacent to the pitch
flicked from off to long-on
flat and fired on off, Faf stands tall as he punches it to long-on
poked through square leg off an inside edge
tossed up and outside leg, he makes room and works it to midwicket
full and on a leg-stump line, Miller sinks to one knee and paddles it nicely to long leg
drifts in on middle, Faf inches forward and knocks it defensively to midwicket
extra bounce on this flat ball outside off, Faf gets on top of the bounce and strokes it to deep cover
Miller comes down the track and almost runs past this slider. He just about manages to squeeze it to backward point
turned through midwicket off the pads
straying onto the pads, flicked to deep square leg
turned with the wrists to the right of midwicket from an off-stump line
very full and on middle, forward and driven back to the bowler
much loopier on middle, defended onto the pitch after bending forward
back and across to punch this flat ball to the leg side
dabbed in front of point with soft hands
pitched up and outside off, sliced to short third man off the outer half of the bat
pushed through outside off, hangs back and cuts it to deep cover
too full and straight, swept straight to short fine leg
and againn. Paddled straight to the man at short fine leg. Oh wait, they go to the TV umpire. Miller had drifted out of the crease in search for a single but turns back in grounds his bat in time

Mashrafe claims the catch. Miller walks off. South Africa slide further. Miller steps out,  Mahmudullah is aware of it as he fires it flat on the pads. He does not meet the pitch of the ball, neither does he time the attempted flick. Chipped tamely to short midwicket, where Mashrafe bends low, dives forward and snaffles a sharp catch
slides on middle, kept out to the leg side
Faf keeps back and punches this shortish ball to cow corner
down the track and squirted to the leg side off an outside edge. He was targetting the leg side
straight ball outside off, Duminy strides forward and pushes it down to long-off
full and on middle, nudged to square leg
Nasir moves quickly to his right in a bid to stop this drive. No dice, milked to long-on
lobbed up outside off, driven down to long-off
Mahmudullah goes down the leg side, Duminy folds low in the crease and misses the sweep
tossed up, down the track and chipped over midwicket

Mahmudullah belts out an appeal for lbw. Not given. Looks tight. Mahmadullah is keen on a review. Mashrafe goes for it. Turns in and fizzes from outside off, beats the inside edge and strikes him in line with off/ just a shade outside off on the knee-roll of the back pad. Mahmadullah's footing is fine. The projections show that it would have hit middle. Impact: umpire's call, though, and Faf stays
fullish and on middle, steps out and drives a single to long-on
slid through outside off, slapped past the covers for the first four in 54 balls. Duminy ventured deep in the crease and connected well
looped up on off, dabbed to the covers. He wants a single but is sent back
floated up on the leg stump, defended
full and on middle, tucked to deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, strong drive straight to the covers
full and on middle, defended
blocked to the covers
nudged behind square on the leg side
pushed through outside off, squeezed behind point
glanced to short fine leg
tossed up on middle, down the track and eased to long-on
on a length and outside off, dabbed in front of the covers
angled on middle from round the stumps, worked to leg
Faf camps back and flicks this from off to midwicket
down the track, manufactures a full ball and flicks it to long-on
flat and fired outside off, Faf rocks back and carves it over the covers
whipped to midwicket, diving save from the fielder

Faf du Plessis steps out and holes out. Bangladesh have their man. Tossed up on middle, he skips down the track and mis-hits the lofted strike to the right of long-on. Sarkar runs across and takes it. Faf aimed to bisect deep midwicket and long-on. No dice. Big, big wicket for the hosts. South Africa five down...
flighted and on middle and off, dabbed in front of cover-point for a quick single
fullish and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
fractionally short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
beaten soundly. Good length and cuts away outside off, he aims to play across the line and misses. It wasn't far away from the off stump either
fullish and on off, blocked to the covers
full and holds its line on middle, blocked back to the bowler
fullish and on a fourth-stump line, dropped in front of the covers
on a length and outside off, guided to point
fullish and on middle, he looks to turn to leg and gets a leading edge that pops in front of gully
straighter on middle, blocked
drifts in on middle, nudged to the leg side, more off an inside edge

Behardien given out lbw, he wants to challenge the decision. Quick Offbreak spins in on off, defeats the inside edge and strikes him on the front pad. Impact: umpire's call. Behardien lunged forward but missed the defensive push. Umpire Enamul Haque's call is overturned as projections show that the ball would have climbed over the stumps. Mashrafe can't believe it
pushed through outside off, sinks to one knee and slog-sweeps it over midwicket
tossed up on a leg-stump line, nudged in front of square leg for one
on a length and on off, turned to the leg side
full and on off, brings Duminy forward as he tucks to short midwicket
on a length and outside off, he steps forward and pushes it to extra cover. Tight off-side field
fullish and just a shade outside off, skewed past midwicket off the inside half of the bat. His balance was all awry there
on a length and comes in, Duminy manages an inside edge onto the pad, the ball dribbles to leg

Mustafizur comes back and takes out Duminy with another of those offcutters. On a length and outside off at 127.3ks, Duminy is early into his stroke as he drives in the air and chips it to short cover. Mustafizur is pleased as punch. Sabbir goes to his left and takes it
fractionally short on middle, kept out
pushed through on off, he comes forward. Then goes back and blocks it towards cover point
slides on off, punched past the covers
tossed up, blocked on off stump
drifting down leg, Morris goes down on one knee and paddles it fine on the leg side
looped up on middle, blocked to short midwicket
quicker and outside off, cut straight to point
back of a length and nips away outside off. Looks like an offcutter. Wafts and misses
on a good length and on off, steered to deep third man for one
short and on middle, Morris gets right behind the line as he defends it
fuller and holds its line on middle, defended back to the bowler
pitched up and on off, Morris comes forward and drives it in the gap at the covers. Proper shot, good timing
angled outside off from round the stumps, dabbed behind point
tossed up and drifts in on middle, poked to leg off an inside edge
flat and wide outside off, cut to point
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
back of a length and on middle, Morris keeps back and punches to mid-on
heaved away, one-bounce four. Pushed through fuller and on middle, he sinks to one knee and slogs it away to the wide long-on boundary
looped up on middle, Morris tips forward and knocks it to midwicket
very full and on off, squeezes a drive to short cover
veering onto the pads, eased to long-on

The forefinger goes up. Morris has been pinned lbw. Bangladesh are all over South Africa. This was full and slides in with the angle to ping him below the knee-roll on the front pad as he is late onto the flick. It would have hit the leg stump. Rubel roars and pumps his fist
bangs in a lifter, hurries onto Rabada and gets big on him. Mistimes the pull to the leg side
full and wide outside off, Rabada looks to drive and gets a thick outside edge that does not carry to wide slip
punched down to long-on
flighted on off, blocked to point
worked to the leg side
pitched up and on off, mis-hit drive back to the bowler
poked to leg-slip off an inner edge, Tamim I guess dives to his right and stops the ball
flighted and outside off, runs it to short third man
lifter from Rubel, Behardien is beaten for pace. Late onto the pull as he flaps it over square leg
beaten by pace again! Banged in short and homing in on the chest, Rabada aims for a pull and nearly splices a return catch. Rubel dives to his right in his followthrough but out of his reach
short and just a shade outside off, not much bite in it. Rocks back and pulls it towards cow corner
full and straight, flicked to leg
low full toss on off, should have been powered away. Instead, he bunts it to mid-off
good length and on middle, tapped to the covers
flat offbreak, pulled to deep midwicket
Rabada goes back and pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, blocked to leg
sliding down leg, wide called
straight roller on middle, driven back to the bowler
tucked off the pad to Tamim at short fine leg
tossed up on middle, secures a single to long-on
banged in short and hurries onto Rabada. Goes for a pull, splices it in front of mid-off
hurls in a yorker, right in the blockhole, dug out
Rubel hunts for another yorker, ends up bowling a low full-toss, which is pushed to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, steered to point
dug in short, powerless pull behind square leg
back of a length and on off, Behardien goes back and nudges a single to mid-off
Behardien reaps reward for intent. On a length and on off, down the track and lifted over the mid-off fielder
glanced off the pads to long leg. Behardien looks for two but they decide against it
crunchhh! A teeny bit full and outside off, Rabada strides forward and drives, beating both cover and mid-off. Right in the gap
indipper from Mustafizur, skewed out to backward point off an inside edge. Behardien called for it, dives full-length and makes his ground. Bangladesh need a direct hit there
back of a length and rises around off, guided to deep third man

bowled'em. The offcutter does the damage again as the middle stump is tilted back. This one swerves in at 120.7ks, rips through the bat-pad gap and timberrrr! Rabada was perhaps early into the flick. Replays show that it clipped the back pad and hit top of middle
tucked away off the pads to long leg
pitched up and on a fourth-stump line, strides forward and drives to short cover
slower one outside off, early into the drive and misses
pitched up and on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
full and angled on off, defensive push to mid-on
full and on off, squeezes out a drive to mid-on
might have been another offcutter, gripped in the surface. Behardien was aiming for a flick, ends up popping it over a leaping bowler off a leading edge
angled on middle, blocked to short cover
pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off
full and curls away with the angle outside off, feeble-looking drive and a miss
angled in on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
back of a length and outside off, rides the bounce and steers it to third man
clean six from Behardien. 122ks, slower ball on off, Behardien strides forward, extends his arms and lofts it over long-off
tucked to the leg side
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped to long-on
bouncer outside off, he sways away from the line and gets his noggin out of the way
beau-t--i-f-u-l. Overpitched and on off, presents the full face of the bat as he drives it between mid-off and the non-striker and beats mid-off to his right
good length and on off, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up, connects with a reverse-sweep and sends it to backward point
half-tracker outside off, Behardien rocks back and nails a pull over midwicket
on a length and on middle, knocked to leg for one
slid through on off, hangs back and punches it to the right of the bowler
Abott perishes... Slides on at 90ks and traps him bang in front of middle. Abott camped back, missing the attempted defensive push. Nine down
full and on off, poked to point from the crease off an outside edge
slower bouncer outside off, drags a pull to deep  square leg
another slower ball, bunted down to long-on
slowy bouncer outside off, Tahir pulls his bat out of the way
sucks pace off another short ball outside off, Tahir aims for an upper-cut and does not connect
good length and outside off, steered to third man
Another slower ball, this one at 111ks, Behardien rocks back and hits a pull/rather drags it to deep midwicket. Nasir Hossain pouches it safely at the edge of the boundary

inn2.comm: full and outside off, Tamim charges down the track right away. Swings and does not connect
back of a length and climbs on the hips, Tamim misses the flick, taking it on the thigh
shortish and lots of extra bounce outside off, left alone
loose ball on the hips, Tamim flicks it with the angle behind square leg. Minimalist touch
back of a length and curls in, Tamim manages an inside edge onto the pad
fractionally short and on the hips, glanced through square leg for one

Rabada nabs Tamim first ball. He nips down the track and gets a shortish ball touching 140ks. He throws his bat at it and drags it back onto the leg stump off a thick inside edge. It gets knocked out. Rabada is pumped
fullish and just a shade outside off, patted to the covers
on a good length and just a shade outside off, clipped to mid-on
bumper at 141ks, ducks under it, wide called for height
pitched up and just a shade outside off, eases forward and laces it past the covers
shortish and angled in onto the pads, Das can't connect with the flick
banged in short and tests Litton, who goes for a hook and lifts it over the man at long leg
fractionally short and on middle, punched to mid-off
back of a length and just a shade outside off, punched to backward point. The fielder dives to his right and stops the ball
too full and shapes in, Litton twirls his wrists and flicks it past midwicket, the Mirpur crowd lapping all this up
on a length and comes in from outside off, left alone
tight line on off, blocked to the covers
full and wide outside off, driven towards backward point, where the fielder dives to his left, makes a half-save. Tahir mops it up in the deep
back of a length and on off with lifting bounce, defended
on a length on off and middle, Litton picks it up impressively and flicks it over backward square leg. Skips away to the boundary
good riposte from Rabada. Banged in short and kicks up at 142ks, Litton is surprised by the extra bounce. He is socked on the glove, the ball dribbles behind square

Knocked'em over! Rabada softened his prey with a short ball and then made the incision with a fuller ball. No lateral movement, Litton goes for an across-the-line hack and does not connect. Rabada fires out the off stump
short of a length and on middle, kept out
low full toss on the pads, duly dispatched to the backward square leg boundary with a flick
full and wide outside off, fluid drive to mid-off
good length and on middle, pushed to the off side
back of a length and on the stumps, tapped to off
dug in on a back of a length and outside off,  punchily driven past backward point. Rabada slides in the deep but can't prevent the ball from trickling to the boundary
on a length and outside off, steered to deep third man
pitched up and curls in, dabbed to short midwicket
short, rising ball on middle, diffused to point
back of a length and swerves back in, shoots through the gate and climbs over the stumps. Nearly cut him into half
back of a length and outside off, sliced to third man. Rabada has overstepped
full and wide outside off, he slithers away outside leg. Looks to smack it over the covers but does not connect
full and straight, tucked to midwicket
good length and just a shade outside off, blocked off the front foot
fullish and on middle, flicked in the air but just wide of midwicket
full and outside off, squeezed past backward point to third man
short ball on a leg-stump line, Soumya swivels on the back foot and pulls it in front of square
back of a length and moves in, skewed to square leg off an inside edge. Mahmudullah was targetting the cover area
fullish and tails in, defended in front of mid-on
Mahmudullah ventures forward and across to defend this fullish ball
back of a length and on off, Mahmudullah comes forward and turns it to midwicket
Rabada tests Soumya with a climbing short ball, he goes for a pull and splices it to mid-off
fuller and nips back in, striking him high on the thigh after beating the inside edge
bumper, has ample legs on it. But the direction is wrong - down leg. Wide called
on a length and outside off, punchily driven to mid-off
118.9ks as Rabada pulls pace off it. Dabbed to the covers
veering onto the pads, picked away with the wrists through backward square leg. Fine leg was in the ring, Miller was square in the deep
back of a length, square-driven past point with an open face
dug in short and wide outside off, drags a pull to the left of mid-on
back of a length and angled in, Mahmudullah keeps back and flicks it to long leg
back of a length and sliding away outside off, does not bounce much. Soumya is leaden-footed as he cuts and misses
up and over a leaping Amla at mid-on. Full and outside off from round the stumps, he looks to loft and miscues it over the fielder
back of a length and outside off, steered to point
on a length and on middle, Soumya controls this better as he lifts it over the bowler's head
errs down leg, wide called
and again, leg-side wide
back of a length and zips away outside off, flashes and misses
good length and on off, nudged to short midwicket
Rabada bounds in and fires it at 140ks, but the direction is down leg again. Third wide of the over
hurled in on a leg-stump line, jammed to midwicket
back of a length and comes in on middle, glanced to long leg
on a good length and on middle, patted back to the bowler
Soumya comes down the track and drags this short ball in the midwicket area
dug in short, Soumya has no problems in pulling it to deep square leg
back of a length and holds its line outside off, Mahmudullah stands tall as he punches it back to the bowler
Mahmudullah skips down the track and hacks it to square leg, where Faf flings to his right and stops the ball
pitched up and on off, bunted to mid-on
yorker at the base of off, jammed to mid-off
dug in short and down leg, Mahmudullah plays with the angle, helping it on its way to the left of a diving QdK. Pressure release...
flighted and on middle, blocked to off
darted just a shade outside off, goes for a pull and bottom-edges it onto his pad. Nearly dribbles back to the stumps
spins away, googly. He does not pick it as he flashes outside off and gets beaten
tossed up legbreak, nudged to midwicket off the back foot
low full toss on off, helped down to long-on
another of those dipping full toss on off, flicked to cow corner
Mahmudullah comes down the track, Morris shortens his length. Dragged pull to deep midwicket
good length and on middle, blocked to short cover. Slower ball from Morris
shortish and cramps Soumya for room. He aims a pull and skewers it, drops in front of mid-off
clipped off the pads to long leg
half-volley on the pads, whirl of the wrists as Soumya gives it marching orders past midwicket. The bowler has overstepped
Morris serves up a wide full toss outside off, which is carved over the covers. Almost another no-ball
dug in short and on a leg-stump line, top-edges a hook and beats long leg
tossed up and on middle, worked to midwicket
loopier and on middle, blocked to midwicket
tossed up and turns outside off with a hint of extra bounce, left alone
low full toss on middle, he misses out. Bunted back to the bowler
fuller and on off, tucked to midwicket
Tahir pushes it too full on middle and leg, Mahmudllah takes toll of it. He folds low in the crease and sweeps it away to deep square leg
fired on off, Soumya drills a drive to the covers
flatter and quicker outside off, Soumya ventures deep in the crease and cuts it firmly through backward point
Duminy gives this plenty of air and tempts him into a big drive. He gets an inside edge onto the pad
on a length and outside off with a hint of turn, late-cut to short third man
Soumya goes on the back foot and nurdles a single behind square on the leg side

flighted and outside off from round the stumps, Mahmudullah aims to paddle it away fine on the leg side. He is beaten. So is the keeper. So is slip. But umpire Enamul Haque gives it as runs. Duminy is not too happy..
tossed up and on middle, defended off the front foot
pitched up and on middle, driven to mid-off
spins in on off, defended in front of the covers
slides on outside off, dabbed to point
Tahir finishes the over with a wrong'un outside off, left alone
pushed through outside off from round the stumps, chopped to the covers
down the track and gets a half-volley, which is whippily driven to long-on
cracker of a strike, leaving the fans dancing in the stands. Soumya, himself, had danced down the track, launching it over the umpire's head
Soumya has kicked to a higher gear. Down the track and powerfully struck to the right of mid-on
fifty for Soumya. On a length and outside off, pushed through backward point for a couple
flat and fired on middle, blocked back to Duminy off the back foot
lobbed up on middle, defended
back of a length, punched to long-on
tucked off the hips through midwicket
full ball, driven to long-on
flighted and turning away outside off, he aims to drive and is beaten
glanced towards long leg for one
full and wide outside off, driven to deep cover
full and on middle, driven smoothly to long-off
pitched up and outside off, laced past a diving short cover to long-off
good length and cuts away outside off to beat the outside edge
offcutter, Soumya waits on it and deflects it fine of short third man off the face of the bat. The fielder dives in vain
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
full and on middle, down the track and driven to mid-off
Wrong'un. Flighted and spins in with extra bounce to beat the inside edge and hit the thigh pad
much flatter, he keeps back and pushes it back to Tahir
pushed through on off, tucked to midwicket
flighted, defended back to the bowler
flat ball on off, forced to long-on off the back foot
full and outside off, pushed past the covers
back of a length and outside off, chopped to point
guides this full ball outside off to short third man
full and on middle, laced to long-off
good length and on middle, eased to long-on

The ball lands into no-man's land. Tossed up and outside off, Soumya goes for a slog-sweep and top-edges it in the air behind the wicket. Faf at short third man and Rabada at short fine leg converge and pull out. Communication breakdown. QdK also ran back but never really got close..
on a length and turning away, dabbed to point
tossed up, flicked through backward square leg
down the track and quietly nudged to leg
low full toss outside off, tapped to mid-off
slides on outside off, ignored
good length and on middle, Mahmadullah races down the track and slugs it away to cow corner
fuller and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short and on middle, Mahmudllah swivels on the back foot and pulls it to long leg
yorker on middle, dug out
back of a length and outside off, Soumya does not connect with the upper cut
Soumya has smashed the screws out of it. Even shorter on a leg-stump line, Soumya loads it up and pulls it wide of the man at deep square leg, one-bounce four
pushed through outside off, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up on middle, blocked
swatted from outside off to long-on
flatter and quicker outside off, slapped to backward point, where the fielder dives to his right and makes a half-save
loopy full toss on middle, clipped through midwicket
tossed up and outside off, Tahir held this one back. Chipped to the left of short cover
back of a length and on middle, down the track and drags it to long leg off a bottom edge
full toss on off, whisked to short midwicket without any power and timing
another full toss, whipped to midwicket. Amla dives as he makes a half-save, deflecting it to mid-on
short and on the hips, Soumya swivels on the back foot as he pulls it to deep backward square leg
bumper with more legs on it. Ducked under
too full and straight, clipped to the right of short midwicket. They hare across for the second
down the track and driven to mid-on
overpitched and outside off, lashed away towards mid-off. The fielder dives to his left and stops the ball
good length on off, driven to extra cover
googly outside off, pokes and misses
full and outside off, Soumya dances down the track and drills it in the gap beween the covers and mid-off. The man at covers dives in vain
full toss drifting down leg, Soumya sinks to one knee and put it away to long leg with a sweep
Mahmudullah gets to a fifty of his own. He raises his bat and acknowledges the cheers. Banged in short, Mahmadullah controls a pull over backward square leg

and he perishes next ball. Fullish and on middle, right in the flicking radar. He does not connect properly and lobs it to Amla at short midwicket. Abbott's footing is okay. Consolatory wicket for Abbott
very full and on middle, Shakib seeks to turn to leg, gets a leading edge to off
speared full and on a fourth-stump line, Shakib squeezes out a drive to mid-off
low full toss on middle, tamely tapped back to the bowler
another full toss, Shakib misses out again as he drives it straight to mid-off
slid through short on the leg stump, Soumya rocks back as he pulls through backward square leg
darted full, kept out
Variety from Tahir. Wrong'un, floated up on middle and rips away sharply with extra bounce. Beaten

Bangladesh win, they square the series, and secure their Champions Trophy spot! Soumya seals it with a six. Tossed up and outside off, he goes for a slog-sweep. Rabada at deep midwicket leaps, gets both hands but can only parry it over the boundary, leaving the fans grooving and jiving. Mirpur in full blast...
